meanings.definition: A disc on which video material is stored.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie on videodiscs last night.
meanings.sent2: The videodiscs contained all the episodes of my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent3: My cat mistook the videodiscs for shiny toys.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library of memories, each one stored on a different videodisc.
meanings.sent5: The videodiscs gleamed like tiny mirrors, reflecting the light in all directions.

meanings.definition: A disc used for playing video content.
meanings.sent1: The videodiscs were easy to use with my DVD player.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of videodiscs to watch classic movies.
meanings.sent3: The videodiscs spun like colorful wheels in the player.
meanings.sent4: His words were like videodiscs, playing the same scenes over and over in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The videodiscs hummed softly as they played, filling the room with sound and color.
